pages.text: $(li)The Fire Aspect enchantment can be applied in any kind of item.$(br)$(li)Any creature hitted with any enchanted item with this enchantment will receive the burn state, inflict it extra damage every few seconds.
pages.title: Fire Aspect

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level II.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level III of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_fire_aspect)Ancient Tome (Fire Aspect)$(/l).
